abstract: Mark Anthony Estrada is charged with murder in fatal shooting of Police Officer Scott Lunger in Alameda County, Calif, during a traffic stop.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Alameda County filed murder charges Friday against a Bay Area man accused of shooting a police sergeant in the head during a traffic stop.

headline.main: California: Man Charged in Police Officer’s Killing
headline.print_headline: California: Man Charged in Police Officer’s Killing

snippet: Prosecutors in Alameda County filed murder charges Friday against a Bay Area man accused of shooting a police sergeant in the head during a traffic stop.
